subject: Alumni SWE Fireside Chat
body: Hello again hackers! Our long-awaited alumni SWE fireside chat will be happening in about 10 mins downstairs in the Venice Room! Come down and talk to our UCLA Hack alumni working in the industry and get raffle entries + plushies while you're at it!

subject: Lunch break!
body: Our dedicated lunch break is starting soon in the Palisades Room! Take a break, stretch your legs, stay hydrated, and grab a bite to eat!

subject: Opening ceremony starts soon!
body:
Hello hackers! The beginning of Hack on the Hill is coming! 

We’re kicking things off at our OPENING CEREMONY in 10 MINS in the Carnesale Commons Palisades Room! Excited to see everyone there and welcome you all to our 12-hour hackathon experience!

subject: Time to check in!
body:
Good morning HOTH XIII participants!

Check in has officially started at Carnesale Commons Palisades Room! We’re excited to see you here!

subject: Welcome to HOTH XIII!
body: Welcome to Hack on the Hill XIII! We're glad to have you, and excited to see what you'll build. HOTH XIII takes place TODAY, Sunday, March 1st, 2026. We'll be periodically updating these announcements with new information, so be sure to keep an eye out! Happy hacking! :)
